mapper.select: select EMP_NUM as empNum, EMP_ID as empId, EMP_PW as empPw, EMP_NAME as empName ,EMP_ADDR as empAddr, EMP_ADDR_DETAIL as empAddrDetail, EMP_POST as empPost ,EMP_PHONE as empPhone, EMP_JUMIN as empJumin, EMP_EMAIL as empEmail ,EMP_HIRE_DATE as empHireDate, EMP_IMAGE as empImage from employees where EMP_ID = #{empId}
